dsOverview.title: Line Island Experiment Surface and Upper Air Observations, February to April 1967

summary.p: The Line Islands Experiment of 1967 produced extensive data on disturbances in the equatorial trough zone. DSS has some surface and upper-air data from this experiment for February through April of 1967.
